name: MetaSpace Portal
short_description: MetaSpace Portal is the new generation of tools to manage, generate, and maintain corporate web portals and their contents. MetaSpace Portal is Portlet Specification API JSR-168 compliant and it has a lot of advanced features to manage portals.
